snippet: The raucous ticker-tape parade was an opportunity for players like Bear Pascoe to soak in New York City’s adulation.
abstract: Celebratory parade in honor of the New York Giant's Super Bowl victory is an opportunity for some of the team's less-heralded players to share the spotlight with their marquee teammates.
lead_paragraph: The raucous ticker-tape parade was an opportunity for players like Bear Pascoe to soak in New York City’s adulation.

headline.seo: Super Bowl — Lesser-Known Giants Have Their Moment, Too
headline.main: Plenty of Cheers All the Way Down the Giants’ Depth Chart
headline.print_headline: Plenty of Cheers All the Way Down the Depth Chart
